name: Special Alien Force Experiment
description:
As the commander of S.A.F.E (Special Alien Force Experiment), it is your job to manage and strategically deploy your roster of aliens in order to fight injustice. 

Stay SAFE Commander!

FUSION -> Combine 2 or 3 aliens together to create a new stronger alien!

ABILITIES -> 30+ unique superpowers!

PUNS -> Many, many puns!

Created for JamCraft 5

Credits:
